item.title: Centre says boundary issue will be discussed during Xis visit
item.description: As it gears up to host Chinese president Xi Jinping India said on Monday it expects that the visit will address the interests and concerns of the two countries and that all substantive issues having bearing on the ties including the boundary dispute will be discussed
item.itunes:subtitle: As it gears up to host Chinese president Xi Jinping India said on Monday it expects that the visit will address the interests and concerns of the two countries and that all substantive issues having bearing on the ties including the boundary dispute will
item.itunes:summary: As it gears up to host Chinese president Xi Jinping India said on Monday it expects that the visit will address the interests and concerns of the two countries and that all substantive issues having bearing on the ties including the boundary dispute will be discussed

item.title: Incursion shadow on Xi Jinping visit China India in 5day skirmish
item.description: The latest incident highlights the bitter differences between the two Asian giants despite the likely bonhomie that will mark the Chinese presidentsnbspfirst Indian visit Boundary issue will be discussed during Xis visit Centre
item.itunes:subtitle: The latest incident highlights the bitter differences between the two Asian giants despite the likely bonhomie that will mark the Chinese presidentsnbspfirst Indian visit Boundary issue will be discussed during Xis visit Centre
item.itunes:summary: The latest incident highlights the bitter differences between the two Asian giants despite the likely bonhomie that will mark the Chinese presidentsnbspfirst Indian visit Boundary issue will be discussed during Xis visit Centre

item.title: Law panel recommends repeal of 72 archaic laws
item.description: Out of these 72 laws 53 belong to the colonial era when statutes were enacted keeping in mind the interests of East India Company or the Crown and to curb independence movement
item.itunes:subtitle: Out of these 72 laws 53 belong to the colonial era when statutes were enacted keeping in mind the interests of East India Company or the Crown and to curb independence movement
item.itunes:summary: Out of these 72 laws 53 belong to the colonial era when statutes were enacted keeping in mind the interests of East India Company or the Crown and to curb independence movement

item.title: Satyam case Accused to appear in court on Oct 27
item.description: A local court trying the case of multicrore accounting fraud in erstwhile Satyam Computer Services Limited SCSL on Monday ordered all the accused to appear before it on October 27
item.itunes:subtitle: A local court trying the case of multicrore accounting fraud in erstwhile Satyam Computer Services Limited SCSL on Monday ordered all the accused to appear before it on October 27
item.itunes:summary: A local court trying the case of multicrore accounting fraud in erstwhile Satyam Computer Services Limited SCSL on Monday ordered all the accused to appear before it on October 27

item.title: Our monsoon almost 40 million years old
item.description: An international research team has now found that the Asian monsoon already existed 40 million years ago during a period of high atmospheric carbon dioxide and warmer temperatures
item.itunes:subtitle: An international research team has now found that the Asian monsoon already existed 40 million years ago during a period of high atmospheric carbon dioxide and warmer temperatures
item.itunes:summary: An international research team has now found that the Asian monsoon already existed 40 million years ago during a period of high atmospheric carbon dioxide and warmer temperatures

item.title: Govt to change job exchanges to career centres
item.description: The central government is all set to restructure the defunct employment exchanges of the country and turn them into career centres on the lines of online job portals like naukricom and timesjobcom likely from next month

item.title: JK floods There was no sign of govt during the deluge
item.description: Like majority of the areas in the valley we got no warning about the flood and while we waited for the water level to recede no one from the government or any rescue team was found on ground writes Gowhar Farooq
item.itunes:subtitle: Like majority of the areas in the valley we got no warning about the flood and while we waited for the water level to recede no one from the government or any rescue team was found on ground writes Gowhar Farooq
item.itunes:summary: Like majority of the areas in the valley we got no warning about the flood and while we waited for the water level to recede no one from the government or any rescue team was found on ground writes Gowhar Farooq

item.title: Reveal name of whistleblower in CBI chief case SC
item.description: The apex court asked Bhushan to give the name of the whistleblower in a sealed envelope and directed its registry to keep all documents and affidavits filed by the CBI chief in sealed cover and deposit it with secretary general for safe custody

item.title: BJP may go extreme as Uddhav rejects demand
item.description: Shiv Sena chief Uddhav Thackeray on Monday rejected the Bharatiya Janata Partys BJP demand to contest 135 of Maharashtras 288 assembly seats in the October 15 polls escalating tensions between the two oldest allies in the National Democratic alliance
item.itunes:subtitle: Shiv Sena chief Uddhav Thackeray on Monday rejected the Bharatiya Janata Partys BJP demand to contest 135 of Maharashtras 288 assembly seats in the October 15 polls escalating tensions between the two oldest allies in the National Democratic alliance
item.itunes:summary: Shiv Sena chief Uddhav Thackeray on Monday rejected the Bharatiya Janata Partys BJP demand to contest 135 of Maharashtras 288 assembly seats in the October 15 polls escalating tensions between the two oldest allies in the National Democratic alliance

item.title: Saradha was running ponzi schemes SFIO
item.description: Completing its probe into chitfund scam of 14 Saradha group firms SFIO on Monday said these companies have been found to be running ponzi schemes and would face prosecution for violating laws
item.itunes:subtitle: Completing its probe into chitfund scam of 14 Saradha group firms SFIO on Monday said these companies have been found to be running ponzi schemes and would face prosecution for violating laws
item.itunes:summary: Completing its probe into chitfund scam of 14 Saradha group firms SFIO on Monday said these companies have been found to be running ponzi schemes and would face prosecution for violating laws

item.title: Saradha Oppn ups demand for Mamata resignation
item.description: Targeting chief minister Mamata Banerjee directly all opposition parties in West Bengal the Left BJP and the Congress have upped the demand for her resignation over the Saradha chit fund scam
item.itunes:subtitle: Targeting chief minister Mamata Banerjee directly all opposition parties in West Bengal the Left BJP and the Congress have upped the demand for her resignation over the Saradha chit fund scam
item.itunes:summary: Targeting chief minister Mamata Banerjee directly all opposition parties in West Bengal the Left BJP and the Congress have upped the demand for her resignation over the Saradha chit fund scam

item.title: Money from cow slaughter funding terror Maneka
item.description: Union minister Maneka Gandhi on Sunday expressed concern about India being the worlds largest beef exporter and claimed that the money from illegal animal slaughter was used for perpetrating acts of terrorism
item.itunes:subtitle: Union minister Maneka Gandhi on Sunday expressed concern about India being the worlds largest beef exporter and claimed that the money from illegal animal slaughter was used for perpetrating acts of terrorism
item.itunes:summary: Union minister Maneka Gandhi on Sunday expressed concern about India being the worlds largest beef exporter and claimed that the money from illegal animal slaughter was used for perpetrating acts of terrorism

item.title: Lessons from first session Be ready with House agenda
item.description: After being perceived to be scrambling for business in its first full Parliament session in JulyAugust the NDA government is gearing up to be fully prepared much ahead of the winter session There too a long list of business is pending before the government
item.itunes:subtitle: After being perceived to be scrambling for business in its first full Parliament session in JulyAugust the NDA government is gearing up to be fully prepared much ahead of the winter session There too a long list of business is pending before the governmen
item.itunes:summary: After being perceived to be scrambling for business in its first full Parliament session in JulyAugust the NDA government is gearing up to be fully prepared much ahead of the winter session There too a long list of business is pending before the government

item.title: JNU AISA wins polls strong show by ABVP
item.description: The Leftist All India Students Association has swept all four seats in the Jawaharlal Nehru Student Union elections but saw a major cut in its vote share as the Akhil Bhartiya Vidyarthi Parishad gained major ground in the leftdominated university
item.itunes:subtitle: The Leftist All India Students Association has swept all four seats in the Jawaharlal Nehru Student Union elections but saw a major cut in its vote share as the Akhil Bhartiya Vidyarthi Parishad gained major ground in the leftdominated university
item.itunes:summary: The Leftist All India Students Association has swept all four seats in the Jawaharlal Nehru Student Union elections but saw a major cut in its vote share as the Akhil Bhartiya Vidyarthi Parishad gained major ground in the leftdominated university
